Uses of Class
components.GameComponents

  • Packages that use GameComponents 
    Package Description
    components  
    controller  
    model  
    view  

    • Uses of GameComponents in components

      Subclasses of GameComponents in components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Castle
      This class defines the castle components for the game.
      class  Coin
      The coin class creates coins for the players during game play.
      class  EpochCounter
      The EpochCounter object is to keep track of the current epoch of the game.
      class  Placeholder
      A placeholder is a blank type of GameComponent.
      class  Tile
      This class is for creating the tiles objects in the game.

    • Uses of GameComponents in controller

      Methods in controller with parameters of type GameComponents 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void GameController.placeComponentOnGameBoard(GameComponents gc, int row, int col)
      Places any game component (tiles/castles, etc.) on the game board.

    • Uses of GameComponents in model

      Fields in model declared as GameComponents 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      GameComponents[][] GameInstance.gameBoard 

    • Uses of GameComponents in view

      Methods in view with parameters of type GameComponents 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private String GameView.Field.calculateCastleIconFileName(GameComponents gc)
      Calculates the icon file name for castles with specific naming conventions.
      private String GameView.Field.calculateTileIconFileName(GameComponents gc)
      Calculates the icon file name for tiles with specific naming conventions.
      private void GameView.Field.drawCompononent(GameComponents gc)
      Method to draw the image icon of a game component on screen.
